title: André Drege, Norwegian Pro Cyclist Who Died in Crash, Was Set to Join WorldTour with Jayco-AlUla in 2025
content:
'He was a late-bloomer': Drege won the 16th Tour of Rhodes in March to put him on the radar of the top WorldTour teams.

Read the full article at André Drege, Norwegian Pro Cyclist Who Died in Crash, Was Set to Join WorldTour with Jayco-AlUla in 2025 on Velo.
author: ahood
